title: Wildfires, record heat spark 'fire-breathing dragon of clouds' over western Canada
content:
1. Wildfires, record heat spark 'fire-breathing dragon of clouds' over western Canada  New York Post
  2. Wildfire amid record heat wave forces entire village in Canada to evacuate: "The whole town is on fire"  CBS News
  3. Families search for loved ones after fire destroys village of Lytton, B.C.  CBC News
  4. B.C. wildfires: Stranger saves disabled man from Lytton fire  CTV News Vancouver
  5. Town Sets All-Time Heat Record, Then Burns to the Ground  Futurism
